dmca.title: Princess and Pirate Parties
dmca.body:
[private]:

Thank you for providing your service.  I appreciate being listed for parties in the Chicago area as well as do it yourself parties all over the world.  My log-in is *********.  Unfortunately, it has come to my attention that there is a company using my trademarked Princess and Pirate Parties name in the Seattle area.  

I have just informed ****** and ********* (owners of the business) of this conflict and given them until the end of February to cease and desist using the Princess and Pirate Parties name.  Please be aware that any unauthorized use of Princess and Pirate Parties' name after February 28, 2007 will result in legal action.

I began use of the Princess and Pirate Parties name prior to 2001 and filed for my trademark June 11, 2003.  My trademark registration number is 3197987.  My business was incorporated in the state of Illinois in 2003 as Princess and Pirate Parties, Inc.  Unless you can show that they have been advertising with you under the Princess and Pirate Parties name prior to 2001, please cooperate in prohibiting their use of the name.

Thank you,
**********
Owner
Princess and Pirate Parties, Inc.
www.PrincessandPirate.com
